items.text: PdfRenderer — This class enables rendering a PDF document.
items.href: Rendering a PDF Document in Android Activity/Fragment (Using PdfRenderer) | by Chahat Jain | Medium

items.text: This class is not thread safe.
items.href: Rendering a PDF Document in Android Activity/Fragment (Using PdfRenderer) | by Chahat Jain | Medium

items.text: Concept : PdfRenderer will convert your PDF page into image and you can show it on ImageView.
items.href: Rendering a PDF Document in Android Activity/Fragment (Using PdfRenderer) | by Chahat Jain | Medium
